resources.string: S.c.o.o.f.s requires permission to view and manage files, application does not use send any of your data by internet, the only use of internet is to send bug or crash reports. The source code of the application is in open source.

S.c.o.o.f.s can store keys or copy data from mass storage devices with FAT32 file system. For proper work strongly recommended to use simple usb type-c adapters with 1 to 1 connection, and do not use USB hubs.
